items.sentence: Tom and Mary have been friends since kindergarten.
Would you like to add anything to what I\'ve said?
Tom piled everything up in the center of the room.
Tom pushed Mary into the room and closed the door.
Tom put the guitar case down so he could hug Mary.
Tom was the one who convinced Mary not to do that.
You can\'t drink seawater because it\'s too salty.
Tom and Mary both don\'t know how to speak French.
Tom and Mary both don\'t understand French at all.
I held on to the rope tightly so I wouldn\'t fall.
